page.title: 10BUS SERVICES
page.content: There are{two bus services}which pass through the village in either direction.{Buses to Cheltenham}leave the bus stop opposite the Cheese Rollers public house on the A46 at twenty minutes past and fifty minutes past every hour from 7.20 to 21.50. {Buses to Gloucester}stop at the bus stop beside the Cheese Rollers on the hour from 8.00 to 21.00. These alternate with{buses to Stroud}which leave the bus stop at half past every hour. There is a bus service which passes through the block{between Cheltenham {and Birdlip}on the B4070. This service runs on Thursdays only, twice in each direction.
